text: KTGB-LP was a low-power television station affiliated with The Inspiration Network, operating on UHF channel 26 in Lubbock, Texas. The station owner was Jennifer Cremeens of Creemeens Broadcasting. ==External links== * Category:Television stations in Lubbock, Texas Category:Defunct terrestrial television stations in the United States Category:Television channels and stations disestablished in 2013 Category:2013 disestablishments in Texas Category:Defunct mass media in Texas
title: KTGB-LP
